Dedicated World Class Security Team

Appknox is a team within your team that ensures complete mobile security so that you can rest assured that your business is protected.

    • Get In Touch


    Why We're Considered Zen at What We Do

    Reduced Security Costs
    Security researchers typically cost $100,000 annually. Appknox reduces this cost and ensures complete security, bringing calm to businesses.
    Higher ROI To Teams
    With a faster app testing cycle, businesses can now concentrate on their core competencies and increase productivity, while Appknox ensures complete security.
    Proactive Attitude
    We combine enterprise-grade security features with intelligent audits to ensure customer and business data is always protected. After all, an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

    From Those Who've Achieved Zen

    "The Appknox team has a deep understanding of security standards in mobile platforms. They are efficient and responsive in addressing any security problems we have".
    Viet Nguyen Tuan, Redmart
    "Appknox helped us scan our app thoroughly. They also tagged a security researcher who helped us understand all our issues, clarify our doubts and suggested appropriate solutions to fix them".
    Neeraj Kumar, DronaHQ
